00088 public:
00089     Texture() { 
00090         numRows = numCols = numUsers = name = 0;
00091         filename = "";
00092     }
00093     ~Texture() {    
00094         freeMemory();
00095     }
00096     void freeMemory() { 
00097         if (pixels != NULL) {
00098             delete [] pixels;
00099         }
00100         numRows = numCols = 0;
00101         GLuint GLid = name;
00102         glDeleteTextures(1, &GLid);
00103     }
00104     int getName() { 
00105         return name;
00106     }
00107 };
